title: Elmira College clinic offers free hearing tests | | wydc-tv.com
text:
Elmira College clinic offers free hearing tests
- Updated
0
Elmira College’s speech and hearing clinic offers free tests and highlights the link between hearing loss and dementia. Join for free screenings at Octagon Fest this Saturday.
As featured on
Elmira College’s speech and hearing clinic provides free tests and highlights the link between untreated hearing loss, dementia, and Alzheimer’s, stressing early detection.
